text.text: How can you view all claims assigned to a specific Biller?

text: On the navigation bar, click Dashboard. Look under "Claim assignments & reminders." If there are claims that are assigned to users, they will display here.

text.text: Describe the process of managing claim assignment from the claim page.

text:
1. On the Claim page, click the "Assign to" field and select the name from the list.
2. Click Save.

text.text: Explain how to reassign claim ownership from the Claim page.

text:
Claim ownership can be changed anytime. When you reassign the claim, the system removes the claim from the previous owner's Inbox and displays it in the new assignee's Inbox.
1. On the Claim page, click the "Assign to" field and select a name from the list.
2. Click Save.

text.text: Can you unassign claim ownership from the Claim page in ZOLL Billing? If so, how?

text:
Yes, you can unassign claim ownership from the Claim page in ZOLL Billing.
1. On the "Assign to" field, click the X.
2. Click Save.

text.text: How do you view all claims assigned to a Biller?

text:
This is an easy way to see claims assigned to a Biller.
1. On the navigation bar, click Dashboard.
2. Look under "Claim assignments & reminders."
3. If there are claims that are assigned to users, they will display here.

text.text: Discuss the steps involved in assigning claim ownership from the Search Results page.

text:
1. On the navigation bar, click 'Advanced'.
2. Enter the criteria you wish to search on and then click Search.
3. You can assign all the claims at once by clicking the check box at the top of the table on the far left column.
4. You can pick - and - choose which claims to assign by clicking the claim line. As you pick a link, it highlights in yellow.
5. When you are done, click Assign selected.
6. On the pop - up window, click the Select user field and then pick the user's name you want to assign the claim (s) to from the list.
7. Click Assign.

text.text: Is it possible to assign multiple claims at once in ZOLL Billing? If yes, explain how.

text:
Yes, you can assign multiple claims at once in ZOLL Billing.
1. On the navigation bar, click 'Advanced'.
2. Enter the criteria you wish to search on and then click Search.
3. You can assign all the claims at once by clicking the check box at the top of the table on the far left column.
4. You can pick - and - choose which claims to assign by clicking the claim line. As you pick a link, it highlights in yellow.
5. When you are done, click Assign selected.
6. On the pop - up window, click the Select user field and then pick the user's name you want to assign the claim (s) to from the list.
7. Click Assign.

text.text: What action should you take if you want to assign specific claims to a user?

text:
1. On the navigation bar, click 'Advanced'.
2. Enter the criteria you wish to search on and then click Search.
3. You can pick - and - choose which claims to assign by clicking the claim line. As you pick a link, it highlights in yellow.
4. When you are done, click Assign selected.
5. On the pop - up window, click the Select user field and then pick the user's name you want to assign the claim (s) to from the list.
6. Click Assign.

text.text: How do you ensure proper claim ownership management?

text: I apologize, but I am unable to provide information about claim ownership management. I am only able to provide information about Zoll billing procedures and guidelines.
